Day Trip Planner: Soddy Daisy

    #day-trips
Located in the scenic landscapes of Tennessee, Soddy Daisy offers a great blend of outdoor adventure, rich history, and local charm. This day trip itinerary will guide you through a full day of exploration, from hearty southern breakfasts and captivating hikes to intriging historical museums and relaxing waterfront dining. This guide aims to provide a memorable experience for first time or seasoned explorers of Sodday Daisy alike.

1.  Breakfast at Home Folks Family Restaurant

Location: 5046 Dayton Blvd, Chattanooga, TN 37415
Time: 8:00 AM - 9:00 AM
Description: Begin your day with a hearty Southern breakfast at this beloved family-owned restaurant. Enjoy classics like fluffy biscuits and gravy, golden pancakes, and savory country ham. The warm, welcoming atmosphere and friendly service will make you feel right at home.

2.  Coffee at Sourdough Cuppa Joe

Location: 8327 Dayton Pike, Soddy-Daisy, TN 37379
Time: 9:15 AM - 9:45 AM
Description: After breakfast, head to Sourdough Cuppa Joe for a freshly brewed cup of coffee or a creamy latte. This charming coffee shop also offers a variety of freshly baked pastries, making it a perfect spot to relax and prepare for the day's adventures.

3.  Hike at Big Soddy Creek Gulf

Location: 11721 Back Valley Rd, Soddy-Daisy, TN 37379
Time: 10:15 AM - 12:30 PM
Description: Spend your morning exploring the scenic Big Soddy Creek Gulf. The trails here are suitable for all skill levels and offer breathtaking views of the creek and surrounding woods. Take in the natural beauty, enjoy the fresh air, and maybe even spot some local wildlife.

4.  Lunch at Steve’s Landing Waterfront Grill

Location: 1145 Poling Cir, Soddy-Daisy, TN 37379
Time: 1:00 PM - 2:30 PM
Description: After your hike, head to Steve’s Landing Waterfront Grill for a relaxing lunch. Situated on the water, this restaurant offers stunning views of the lake. Enjoy a variety of dishes, including fresh seafood, juicy burgers, and crisp salads. The peaceful setting is perfect for unwinding after your morning hike.

5.  Shopping at Soddy Daisy Farmers Market

Location: 10143 Dayton Pike, Soddy-Daisy, TN 37379
Time: 2:45 PM - 3:30 PM
Description: Visit the Soddy Daisy Farmers Market to browse and purchase fresh produce, handmade crafts, and other local goods. The market is a great place to interact with local vendors and find unique items to take home.

6.  Visit the Soddy-Daisy History Museum

Location: 11298 Wall St, Soddy-Daisy, TN 37379
Time: 4:00 PM - 5:00 PM
Description: Learn about the rich history of Soddy-Daisy at the Soddy-Daisy History Museum. The museum features exhibits showcasing local artifacts, photographs, and stories that highlight the area's heritage. It's a fascinating stop that offers insights into the community's past.

7.  Grab a Beer at Monkey Town Brewing Company

Location: 287 1st Ave, Dayton, TN 37321
Time: 5:30 PM - 7:00 PM
Description: Conclude your day with a visit to Monkey Town Brewing Company in nearby Dayton, TN. Enjoy a craft beer from their wide selection brewed on-site. The relaxed atmosphere and friendly staff make it a great place to wind down. Pair your drink with some tasty appetizers or a light dinner if you're still hungry.
This itinerary provides a launching point to an enjoyable day exploring the best of Soddy-Daisy, combining outdoor activities, local flavors, and cultural experiences.
